title: Gold 2 support LF ADC duo Gold 2+
body:
I main Janna, Sona, Thresh and lulu but play anything depending on the situation. Looking for a stable adc duo partner to play consistently and frequently with. 
My in game name is : Scyther Bot        
Gold 1+ preferably as i am in my promos for gold 1 as well. 

Having a mic is always prefered =]
